channel.title: The border in question
channel.description:
Documentary series on U.S.-Canadian relations, from a Canadian point of view.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: The U.S. and us
item.description: This program looks at Canada's sometimes-uneasy role as a military partner with the United States.
item.dc:creator: McCarthy, William
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: Water treatment
item.description: This program focuses on the issue of international water rights.
item.dc:creator: McCarthy, William
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: No truck nor trade
item.description: This program focuses on this history of resentment, as well as changing attitudes, in Canada toward the United States.
item.dc:creator: McCarthy, William
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: Ties that bind
item.description: This program explores both tensions and amity between Canada and the United States.
item.dc:creator: McCarthy, William
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: What's "international"?
item.description: This program focuses on the position of Canadian union ties with big American unions.
item.dc:creator: McCarthy, William
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: Word and picture war
item.description: This program explores the cultural similarities and differences between Canada and the United states.
item.dc:creator: McCarthy, William
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: Two for trade, trade for...?
item.description: This program explores Canada and the United States' trade relationship.
item.dc:creator: McCarthy, William
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: Time and the border, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, looks at Canada's past and some of the factors that have influenced its relationship with the United States.
item.dc:creator: McCarthy, William
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: Time and the border, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, looks at Canada's past and some of the factors that have influenced its relationship with the United States.
item.dc:creator: McCarthy, William
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: International shady-lady
item.description: This program presents a satirical review of previous programs.
item.dc:creator: McCarthy, William
item.dc:subject: World Politics
